00010 #if (FLT == VL_TYPE_FLOAT)
00011 #define COMPARISONFUNCTION_TYPE VlFloatVectorComparisonFunction
00012 #else
00013 #define COMPARISONFUNCTION_TYPE VlDoubleVectorComparisonFunction
00014 #endif

00018 VL_EXPORT T
00019 VL_XCAT(_vl_distance_l2_, SFX)
00020 (vl_size dimension, T const * X, T const * Y)
00021 {
00022   T const * X_end = X + dimension ;
00023   T acc = 0.0 ;
00024   while (X < X_end) {
00025     T d = *X++ - *Y++ ;
00026     acc += d * d ;
00027   }
00028   return acc ;
00029 }
00030 
00031 VL_EXPORT T
00032 VL_XCAT(_vl_distance_l1_, SFX)
00033 (vl_size dimension, T const * X, T const * Y)
00034 {
00035   T const * X_end = X + dimension ;
00036   T acc = 0.0 ;
00037   while (X < X_end) {
00038     T d = *X++ - *Y++ ;
00039     acc += VL_MAX(d, -d) ;
00040   }
00041   return acc ;
00042 }
00043 
00044 VL_EXPORT T
00045 VL_XCAT(_vl_distance_chi2_, SFX)
00046 (vl_size dimension, T const * X, T const * Y)
00047 {
00048   T const * X_end = X + dimension ;
00049   T acc = 0.0 ;
00050   while (X < X_end) {
00051     T a = *X++ ;
00052     T b = *Y++ ;
00053     T delta = a - b ;
00054     T denom = (a + b) ;
00055     T numer = delta * delta ;
00056     if (denom) {
00057       T ratio = numer / denom ;
00058       acc += ratio ;
00059     }
00060   }
00061   return acc ;
00062 }
00063 
00064 VL_EXPORT T
00065 VL_XCAT(_vl_kernel_l2_, SFX)
00066 (vl_size dimension, T const * X, T const * Y)
00067 {
00068   T const * X_end = X + dimension ;
00069   T acc = 0.0 ;
00070   while (X < X_end) {
00071     T a = *X++ ;
00072     T b = *Y++ ;
00073     acc += a * b ;
00074   }
00075   return acc ;
00076 }
00077 
00078 VL_EXPORT T
00079 VL_XCAT(_vl_kernel_l1_, SFX)
00080 (vl_size dimension, T const * X, T const * Y)
00081 {
00082   T const * X_end = X + dimension ;
00083   T acc = 0.0 ;
00084   while (X < X_end) {
00085     T a = *X++ ;
00086     T b = *Y++ ;
00087     T a_ = VL_XCAT(vl_abs_, SFX) (a) ;
00088     T b_ = VL_XCAT(vl_abs_, SFX) (b) ;
00089     acc += a_ + b_ - VL_XCAT(vl_abs_, SFX) (a - b) ;
00090   }
00091   return acc / ((T)2) ;
00092 }
00093 
00094 VL_EXPORT T
00095 VL_XCAT(_vl_kernel_chi2_, SFX)
00096 (vl_size dimension, T const * X, T const * Y)
00097 {
00098   T const * X_end = X + dimension ;
00099   T acc = 0.0 ;
00100   while (X < X_end) {
00101     T a = *X++ ;
00102     T b = *Y++ ;
00103     T denom = (a + b) ;
00104     if (denom) {
00105       T numer = 2 * a * b ;
00106       T ratio = numer / denom ;
00107       acc += ratio ;
00108     }
00109   }
00110   return acc ;
00111 }

00114 
00115 VL_EXPORT COMPARISONFUNCTION_TYPE
00116 VL_XCAT(vl_get_vector_comparison_function_, SFX)(VlVectorComparisonType type)
00117 {
00118   COMPARISONFUNCTION_TYPE function = 0 ;
00119   switch (type) {
00120     case VlDistanceL2   : function = VL_XCAT(_vl_distance_l2_,   SFX) ; break ;
00121     case VlDistanceL1   : function = VL_XCAT(_vl_distance_l1_,   SFX) ; break ;
00122     case VlDistanceChi2 : function = VL_XCAT(_vl_distance_chi2_, SFX) ; break ;
00123     case VlKernelL2     : function = VL_XCAT(_vl_kernel_l2_,     SFX) ; break ;
00124     case VlKernelL1     : function = VL_XCAT(_vl_kernel_l1_,     SFX) ; break ;
00125     case VlKernelChi2   : function = VL_XCAT(_vl_kernel_chi2_,   SFX) ; break ;
00126     default: assert(0) ; break ;
00127   }
00128 
00129 #ifdef VL_SUPPORT_SSE2
00130   if (vl_cpu_has_sse2() && vl_get_simd_enabled()) {
00131     switch (type) {
00132       case VlDistanceL2   : function = VL_XCAT(_vl_distance_l2_sse2_,   SFX) ; break ;
00133       case VlDistanceL1   : function = VL_XCAT(_vl_distance_l1_sse2_,   SFX) ; break ;
00134       case VlDistanceChi2 : function = VL_XCAT(_vl_distance_chi2_sse2_, SFX) ; break ;
00135       case VlKernelL2     : function = VL_XCAT(_vl_kernel_l2_sse2_,     SFX) ; break ;
00136       case VlKernelL1     : function = VL_XCAT(_vl_kernel_l1_sse2_,     SFX) ; break ;
00137       case VlKernelChi2   : function = VL_XCAT(_vl_kernel_chi2_sse2_,   SFX) ; break ;
00138       default: /* if no driver is provided, fallback to baseline */ break ;
00139     }
00140   }
00141 #endif
00142 
00143   return function ;
00144 }

00146 /* ---------------------------------------------------------------- */
00147 
00148 VL_EXPORT void
00149 VL_XCAT(vl_eval_vector_comparison_on_all_pairs_, SFX)
00150 (T * result, vl_size dimension,
00151  T const * X, vl_size numDataX,
00152  T const * Y, vl_size numDataY,
00153  COMPARISONFUNCTION_TYPE function)
00154 {
00155   int xi ;
00156   int yi ;
00157 
00158   assert (X) ;
00159   if (numDataX == 0) return ;
00160 
00161   if (Y) {
00162     if (numDataY == 0) return ;
00163     for (yi = 0 ; yi < numDataY ; ++ yi) {
00164       for (xi = 0 ; xi < numDataX ; ++ xi) {
00165         *result++ = (*function)(dimension, X, Y) ;
00166         X += dimension ;
00167       }
00168       X -= dimension * numDataX ;
00169       Y += dimension ;
00170     }
00171   } else {
00172     T * resultTransp = result ;
00173     Y = X ;
00174     for (yi = 0 ; yi < numDataX ; ++ yi) {
00175       for (xi = 0 ; xi <= yi ; ++ xi) {
00176         T z = (*function)(dimension, X, Y) ;
00177         X += dimension ;
00178         *result       = z ;
00179         *resultTransp = z ;
00180         result        += 1 ;
00181         resultTransp  += numDataX ;
00182       }
00183       X -= dimension * (yi + 1) ;
00184       Y += dimension ;
00185       result       += numDataX - (yi + 1) ;
00186       resultTransp += 1        - (yi + 1) * numDataX ;
00187     }
00188   }
00189 }
